      Builds the minimal object necessary to create a new crawler for PostgreSQL, using basic authentication, with the default settings.

    • Method Detail

      • directBasicAuth

        public static Workflow directBasicAuth​(AtlanClient client,
                                       java.lang.String connectionName,
                                       java.lang.String hostname,
                                       java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String database)
                                throws AtlanException
        Builds the minimal object necessary to create a new crawler for PostgreSQL, using basic authentication, with the default settings.
        Parameters:
        client - connectivity to Atlan
        connectionName - name of the connection to create
        hostname - of the PostgreSQL instance
        username - through which to access PostgreSQL
        password - through which to access PostgreSQL
        database - name of the database in PostgreSQL to crawl
        Returns:
        the minimal workflow necessary to crawl PostgreSQL
        Throws:
        AtlanException - if there is any issue obtaining the admin role GUID

      • directBasicAuth

        public static Workflow directBasicAuth​(AtlanClient client,
                                       java.lang.String connectionName,
                                       java.lang.String hostname,
                                       int port,
                                       java.lang.String username,
                                       java.lang.String password,
                                       java.lang.String database,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> adminRoles,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> adminGroups,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> adminUsers,
                                       boolean allowQuery,
                                       boolean allowQueryPreview,
                                       long rowLimit,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> includeAssets,
                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.String>> excludeAssets)
                                throws AtlanException
        Builds the minimal object necessary to create a new crawler for PostgreSQL.
        Parameters:
        client - connectivity to Atlan
        connectionName - name of the connection to create
        hostname - of the PostgreSQL instance
        port - on which the PostgreSQL instance is running
        username - through which to access PostgreSQL
        password - through which to access PostgreSQL
        database - name of the database in PostgreSQL to crawl
        adminRoles - the GUIDs of the roles that can administer this connection
        adminGroups - the names of the groups that can administer this connection
        adminUsers - the names of the users that can administer this connection
        allowQuery - whether to allow SQL queries against the source (true) or not (false)
        allowQueryPreview - whether to allow data previews for the source (true) or not (false)
        rowLimit - the maximum number of rows that can be returned by a query
        includeAssets - which assets to include when crawling (when null: all). The map should be keyed by database name, with the list of values giving the list of schemas within that database to include.
        excludeAssets - which assets to exclude when crawling (when null: none). The map should be keyed by database name, with the list of values giving the list of schemas within that database to exclude.
        Returns:
        the minimal workflow necessary to crawl PostgreSQL
        Throws:
        InvalidRequestException - if there is no administrator specified for the connection, or the provided filters cannot be serialized to JSON
        NotFoundException - if the specified administrator does not exist
        AtlanException - on any other error, such as an inability to retrieve the users, groups or roles in Atlan
